plot: Two young boys decide to stay awake through the evening by riding their bicycles, exploring the night and its creatures until sunrise.
title: Striplings in the Night
plot_es: Two young boys decide to stay awake through the evening by riding their bicycles, exploring the night and its creatures until sunrise.
plot_en: Two young boys decide to stay awake through the evening by riding their bicycles, exploring the night and its creatures until sunrise.
